## Description

A clear description of the color change or feature you'd like to see.

## Design Hierarchy

Which level does this affect?

- [ ] CRITICAL (keywords, errors, functions)
- [ ] IMPORTANT (numbers, parameters, escapes)
- [ ] DATA (strings, comments)
- [ ] STRUCTURE (operators, punctuation)
- [ ] METADATA (annotations, tags)
- [ ] FEEDBACK (warnings, TODO, deprecated)

## Use Case

Why would this change improve readability or reduce eye strain?

## Proposed Solution

If you have specific color suggestions, describe them here (include hex codes if possible).

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative color choices?

## Screenshots

Add screenshots or mockups to illustrate your suggestion.
